metadata.name: #1 - Captain Davi
metadata.description:
#1 Captain Davi:

The first character of HOBI, a brave warrior and a swordsman, trustworthy and a companion for his fellow soldiers, is a kind and helping character but his soul is arrogant!
He tries to find out the mysterious story of the other 99 soldiers!!!

ðŸ¥· The story is about 100 toy soldiers which has been created in a factory.
After creation, a metaphysician has put a spell on these gorgeous toys, breathing100 ancient souls into their bodies and brought them to life, so they have ego and the power to make decisions.ðŸ”®
These soldiers have givens souls, different from their physical appearance and they have to play roles unlike the personalities. What a messy PARADOX!!!
